TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileUpload extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 显示一个文本框控件和一个浏览按钮，使用户可以选择要上载到服务器的文件。

span.span: Displays a text box control and a browse button that enable users to select a file to upload to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [保存已上载的文件Saving Uploaded Files](#saving_uploaded_files) - [安全注意事项Security Considerations](#security_considerations) - [内存限制Memory Limitations](#memory_limitations) - [与 UpdatePanel 控件使用 FileUpload 控件Using the FileUpload Control with the UpdatePanel Control](#using_the_FileUpload_Control_with_the_UpdatePanel_control) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 类显示一个文本框控件和一个浏览按钮，使用户能够选择客户端上的文件并将其上载到 Web 服务器。The class displays a text box control and a browse button that enable users to select a file on the client and upload it to the Web server. 用户指定要通过输入本地计算机上的文件的完整路径上载的文件 (例如， **C:\MyFiles\TestFile.txt**) 中的控件的文本框。The user specifies the file to upload by entering the full path of the file on the local computer (for example, **C:\MyFiles\TestFile.txt**) in the text box of the control. 或者，用户可以通过单击选择该文件**浏览**按钮，再然后定位到它在**选择文件**对话框。Alternately, the user can select the file by clicking the **Browse** button, and then locating it in the **Choose File** dialog box. 使用要获取客户端使用上载上文件的名称属性控件。Use the property to get the name of a file on a client to upload by using the control. 此属性返回的文件名称不包括客户端上文件的路径。The file name that this property returns does not include the path of the file on the client. 属性可以获取对象，它指向要上载的文件。The property gets a object that points to a file to upload. 此属性用于访问文件的内容作为字节。Use this property to access the contents of the file as bytes. 例如，你可以使用返回的对象属性读取文件的内容作为字节并将其存储在字节数组。For example, you can use the object that is returned by the property to read the contents of the file as bytes and store them in a byte array. 或者，可以使用属性来检索该文件中的所有字节。Alternatively, you can use the property to retrieve all the bytes in the file. 属性获取基础要上载的文件的对象。The property gets the underlying object for the file to upload. 此属性可用于访问该文件的其他属性。You can use this property to access additional properties on the file. 属性获取文件的长度。The property gets the length of the file. 属性获取该文件的 MIME 内容类型。The property gets the MIME content type of the file. 此外，你可以使用属性来访问属性，属性，与方法。In addition, you can use the property to access the property, the property, and the method. 但是，通过提供同样的功能属性，属性，与方法。However, the same functionality is provided by the property, the property, and the method. ## 保存已上载的文件Saving Uploaded Files 控件不自动保存文件到服务器后用户选择要上载的文件。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您必须显式提供的控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供在用户单击以将文件上载一个按钮。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. 为保存指定的文件而编写的代码应调用方法，在服务器将文件的内容保存到指定的路径。The code that you write to save the specified file should call the method, which saves the contents of a file to a specified path on the server. 通常情况下，引发回发到服务器的事件的事件处理方法中调用方法。Typically, the method is called in an event-handling method for an event that raises a post back to the server. 例如，如果你提供一个用于将文件提交按钮，则无法包含要保存该文件内的 click 事件的事件处理方法的代码。For example, if you provide a button to submit a file, you could include the code to save the file inside the event-handling method for the click event. 之前调用方法来保存到服务器的文件，使用属性来验证控件包含一个文件。Before calling the method to save the file to the server, use the property to verify that the control contains a file. 如果返回`true`，调用方法。If the returns `true`, call the method. 如果它返回`false`，显示一条消息指向指示该控件不包含文件的用户。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 不检查属性来确定是否要上载的文件存在，因为默认情况下，此属性包含 0 字节。Do not check the property to determine whether a file to upload exists because, by default, this property contains 0 bytes. 因此，即使控件为空白，属性返回一个非 null 值。As a result, even when the control is blank, the property returns a non-null value. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 当调用方法，你必须指定要在其中保存已上载的文件的目录的完整路径。When you call the method, you must specify the full path of the directory in which to save the uploaded file. 如果你没有应用程序代码中显式指定路径，则当用户尝试上载的文件是引发异常。If you do not explicitly specify a path in your application code, an exception is thrown when a user attempts to upload a file. 此行为有助于保护服务器上的文件安全通过阻止用户能够编写你的应用程序目录结构中的任意位置，以及阻止对敏感的根目录的访问。This behavior helps keep the files on the server secure by preventing users from being able to write to arbitrary locations in your application's directory structure, as well as preventing access to sensitive root directories. 方法将上载的文件写入指定的目录。The method writes the uploaded file to the specified directory. 因此，ASP.NET 应用程序必须在服务器上具有到目录的写访问权限。Therefore, the ASP.NET application must have write access to the directory on the server. 有两种方法的应用可获取写访问权限。There are two ways that the application can get write access. 你可以显式授予写访问权限的帐户在其下运行应用程序，将保存已上载的文件的目录中。You can explicitly grant write access to the account under which the application is running, in the directory in which the uploaded files will be saved. 或者，你可以增加到 ASP.NET 应用程序授予的信任级别。Alternatively, you can increase the level of trust that is granted to the ASP.NET application. 若要获取应用程序对正在执行目录的写访问权限，必须授予应用程序信任级别设置为具有对象值。To get write access to the executing directory for the application, the application must be granted the object with the trust level set to the value. 增加的信任级别会增加对服务器上的资源的应用程序的访问。Increasing the level of trust increases the application's access to resources on the server. 请注意，这是不安全的方法，因为恶意用户获得了你的应用程序的控制，则也将能够在此更高级别的信任下运行。Note that this is not a secure approach, because a malicious user who gains control of your application will also be able to run under this higher level of trust. 它是用户的一种最佳做法具有所需的要运行的应用程序的最小特权的上下文中运行 ASP.NET 应用程序。It is a best practice to run an ASP.NET application in the context of a user with the minimum privileges that are required for the application to run. 有关在 ASP.NET 应用程序的安全性的详细信息，请参阅[Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)和[ASP.NET 信任级别和策略文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1)。For more information about security in ASP.NET applications, see [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad) and [ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1). ## 内存限制Memory Limitations 一种方法来防止遭受拒绝服务攻击是限制可以通过使用上载的文件的大小控件。One way to guard against denial of service attacks is to limit the size of the files that can be uploaded by using the control. 应设置适合于你想要上载的文件的类型的大小限制。You should set a size limit that is appropriate for the types of files that you expect to be uploaded. 默认大小限制为 4096 千字节 (KB) 或 4 兆字节 (MB)。The default size limit is 4096 kilobytes (KB), or 4 megabytes (MB). 你可以允许较大的文件，通过设置上载`maxRequestLength`元素的特性。You can allow larger files to be uploaded by setting the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the element. 若要提高整个应用程序的最大允许的文件大小，设置`maxRequestLength`Web.config 文件中的属性。To increase the maximum allowable file size for the entire application, set the `maxRequestLength` attribute in the Web.config file. 若要指定页允许的最大文件大小增加，设置`maxRequestLength`属性内`location`在 Web.config 中的元素。有关示例，请参阅[位置元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5)。To increase the maximum allowable file size for a specified page, set the `maxRequestLength` attribute inside the `location` element in Web.config. For an example, see [location Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5). 上载大型文件时，用户还可能会收到以下错误消息：When uploading large files, a user might also receive the following error message: `aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520) was recycled because memory consumption exceeded 460 MB (60 percent of available RAM).` 如果你的用户遇到此错误消息，增加的值`memoryLimit`属性中的元素的 Web.config 文件以获取应用程序。If your users encounter this error message, increase the value of the `memoryLimit` attribute in the of element the Web.config file for the application. `memoryLimit`属性指定的最大工作进程可以使用的内存量。The `memoryLimit` attribute specifies the maximum amount of memory that a worker process can use. 如果工作进程超过`memoryLimit`量，创建一个新进程来替换它，并且所有当前请求重新分配给新进程。If the worker process exceeds the `memoryLimit` amount, a new process is created to replace it, and all current requests are reassigned to the new process. 若要控制是否要上载的文件是临时存储在内存中或在服务器上，而处理请求时，设置`requestLengthDiskThreshold`元素的特性。To control whether the file to upload is temporarily stored in memory or on the server while the request is being processed, set the `requestLengthDiskThreshold` attribute of the element. 此属性可用于管理输入的流缓冲区的大小。This attribute enables you to manage the size of the input stream buffer. 默认值为 256 个字节。The default is 256 bytes. 你指定的值不应超过为指定的值`maxRequestLength`属性。The value that you specify should not exceed the value that you specify for the `maxRequestLength` attribute. ## 与 UpdatePanel 控件使用 FileUpload 控件Using the FileUpload Control with the UpdatePanel Control 控件设计要在局部页面呈现过程中使用仅在回发的情况下，不能在异步回发的方案。The control is designed to be used only in postback scenarios and not in asynchronous postback scenarios during partial-page rendering. 当你使用控件内部控件，必须使用的控件时上载文件面板的对象。When you use a control inside an control, the file must be uploaded by using a control that is a object for the panel. 控制用于更新而不是使用回发更新整个页面的页面的选定的区域。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191897)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191897). 本部分包含以下四个示例：This section contains the following four examples: - 第一个示例演示如何创建将文件保存到代码中指定的路径的控件。The first example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. - 第二个示例演示如何创建将文件保存到指定目录中，应用程序的文件系统中的控件。The second example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified directory in the file system for the application. - 第三个示例演示如何创建控件可将文件保存到指定的路径，并限制可以上载的文件的大小。The third example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified path and limits the size of the file that can be uploaded. - 第四个示例演示如何创建将文件保存到指定的路径，并允许仅具有.doc 或.xls 文件扩展名要上载的文件的控件。The fourth example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified path and allows only files that have the .doc or .xls file name extensions to be uploaded. > [!CAUTION] > 这些示例演示的基本语法控件，但它们并未演示所有必要的错误检查应之前完成到保存文件。These examples demonstrate the basic syntax for the control, but they do not demonstrate all the necessary error checking that should be completed before to saving the file. 有关更完整的示例，请参见 。For a more complete example, see . 下面的示例演示如何创建将文件保存到代码中指定的路径的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. 调用方法以在服务器上将文件保存到指定的路径。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/cs/fileuploadclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/VB/fileuploadclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建将文件保存到指定目录中，应用程序的文件系统中的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified directory in the file system for the application. 属性用于获取当前正在执行服务器应用程序的根目录的物理文件系统路径。The property is used to get the physical file system path of the root directory for the currently executing server application. 调用方法以在服务器上将文件保存到指定的路径。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass2/cs/fileuploadclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass2/VB/fileuploadclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建将文件保存到代码中指定的路径的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in the code. 控件可以上载为 5 MB 的文件的大小限制。The control limits the size of the file that can be uploaded to 5 MB. 属性用于访问基础属性，并返回文件的大小。The property is used to access the underlying property and return the size of the file. 如果要上载的文件的大小小于 2 MB，调用方法以在服务器上将文件保存到指定的路径。If the size of the file to upload is less than 2 MB, the method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. 除了检查的应用程序代码中的最大文件大小设置对象，可以设置`maxRequestLength`你的应用程序的配置文件中的最大允许大小将元素的属性。In addition to checking for the maximum file size setting in your application code, you can set the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the element to a maximum allowable size in the configuration file for your application. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass3/cs/fileuploadclass3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass3/VB/fileuploadclass3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建将文件保存到代码中指定的路径的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in the code. 此示例允许仅具有.doc 或.xls 文件扩展名要上载的文件。This example allows only files that have the .doc or .xls file name extensions to be uploaded. 调用方法以返回要上载的文件的扩展名。The method is called to return the extension of the file to upload. 如果文件扩展名为.doc 或.xls 文件名称，调用方法以在服务器上将文件保存到指定的路径。If the file has a .doc or .xls file name extension, the method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass4/cs/fileuploadclass4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass4/VB/fileuploadclass4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 控件不自动保存文件到服务器后用户选择要上载的文件。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您必须显式提供的控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供在用户单击以将文件上载一个按钮。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化的新实例类。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the class. 请注意，此示例演示的构造函数语法，但将在创建后不将功能添加到控件。Note that this example demonstrates the constructor syntax but does not add functionality to the control after it is created. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不会自动从客户端读取文件。The control does not automatically read the file from the client. 您必须显式提供的控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供一个按钮，用户可以单击上载文件。For example, you can provide a button that the user can click to upload the file. 为保存指定的文件而编写的代码可以调用属性，它返回文件的内容。The code that you write to save the specified file could call the property, which returns the contents of the file. 之前调用属性，则应使用属性来验证控件包含要上载的文件。Before calling the property, you should use the property to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 如果返回`true`，调用属性。If the returns `true`, call the property. 如果它返回`false`，显示一条消息指向指示该控件不包含文件的用户。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 如果未提供错误处理代码，以验证文件是否存在，如果尝试保存不存在的文件会引发异常。If you do not provide error-handling code to verify that a file exists, an attempt to save a nonexistent file throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 当用户单击**上载文件**按钮，文件的内容显示为页上的文本框中的字节数。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. 此示例使用上载整个文件的属性。This example uses the property to upload the entire file. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadFileBytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadFileBytes/CS/FileUploadFileBytesCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadFileBytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadFileBytes/VB/FileUploadFileBytesVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The entire file was not read.

summary.span: 获取 对象，它指向要使用 控件上载的文件。

span.span: Gets a object that points to a file to upload using the control.
A that points to a file to upload using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以获取对象，它指向要通过使用上载的文件控件。The property gets a object that points to a file to upload by using the control. 使用属性来访问文件的内容。Use the property to access the contents of the file. 例如，你可以使用读取文件的内容作为字节并将其存储在字节数组此属性所返回的对象。For example, you can use the object that is returned by this property to read the contents of the file as bytes and store them in a byte array. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 属性用于文件的内容读入一个字节数组。The property is used to read the contents of the file into a byte array. 当用户单击**上载文件**按钮，文件的内容显示为页上的文本框中的字节数。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/cs/fileupload.filecontentcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/VB/fileupload.filecontentvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string FileName { get; }
.property instance string FileName
Public ReadOnly Property FileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端上使用 控件上载的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of a file on a client to upload using the control.

value.span: 该字符串指定客户端上使用 上载的文件的名称。

span.span: A string that specifies the name of a file on a client to upload using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取客户端上使用 控件上载的文件的名称。Gets the name of a file on a client to upload using the control. 文件名属性返回不包含客户端上文件的路径。The file name that the property returns does not include the path of the file on the client. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建将文件保存到代码中指定的路径的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. 属性用于获取要上载的文件的名称。The property is used to get the name of the file to upload. 调用方法以将文件保存到指定的路径，在服务器上，使用相同的名称的文件有客户端上。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server, using the same name the file has on the client. 请注意，此示例演示此控件的基本语法，但并不演示在保存该文件之前应完成的所有必要的错误检查。Note that this example demonstrates the basic syntax for this control, but does not demonstrate all the necessary error checking that should be done before saving the file. 有关更完整的示例，请参见 。For a more complete example, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/cs/fileuploadclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/VB/fileuploadclass1vb.aspx#1)]

public: property bool HasFile { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件是否包含文件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains a file.

value.span: 如果 包含文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the contains a file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取一个值，该值指示是否控件包含要上载的文件。The property gets a value indicating whether the control contains a file to upload. 使用此属性以验证要上载的文件存在对该文件执行操作之前。Use this property to verify that a file to upload exists before performing operations on the file. 例如，然后才能调用方法以将文件保存到磁盘，则使用属性以验证该文件存在。For example, before calling the method to save the file to disk, use the property to verify that the file exists. 如果返回`true`，调用方法。If returns `true`, call the method. 如果它返回`false`，显示一条消息指向指示该控件不包含文件的用户。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建执行错误检查的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that performs error checking. 保存该文件之前,调用方法来验证该控件包含要上载的文件。Before saving the file, the method is called to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 此外，方法调用以检查路径中是否已存在具有相同名称的文件。In addition, the method is called to check whether a file with the same name already occurs in the path. 如果是这样，要上载的文件的名称的前面带下划线字符之前调用方法。If it does, the name of the file to upload is prefixed with an underscore character before the method is called. 这可以防止覆盖现有文件。This prevents the existing file from being overwritten. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/cs/fileupload.saveascs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/VB/fileupload.saveasvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取使用 控件上载的文件的基础 对象。

span.span: Gets the underlying object for a file that is uploaded by using the control.

value.span: 使用 上载的文件的 。

span.span: An for a file uploaded by using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取基础对象使用上载的文件，控件。The property gets the underlying object for a file that is uploaded by using the control. 此属性用于访问已上载的文件的其他属性。Use this property to access additional properties on the uploaded file. 你可以使用属性来获取文件的长度。You can use the property to get the length of the file. 你可以使用属性来获取 MIME 内容类型的文件。You can use the property to get the MIME content type of the file. 此外，你可以使用属性来访问属性，属性，与方法。In addition, you can use the property to access the property, the property, and the method. 但是，通过提供同样的功能属性，属性，与方法。However, the same functionality is provided by the property, the property, and the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 当用户单击**上载文件**按钮，文件的内容显示为页上的文本框中的字节数。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. 此示例使用属性来访问属性。This example uses the property to access the property. 属性用于将文件内容复制到的字节数组之前，确定文件的长度。The property is used to determine the length of the file before copying the file contents to a byte array. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/cs/fileupload.filecontentcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/VB/fileupload.filecontentvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveAs (string filename);
.method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename) cil managed
Public Sub SaveAs (filename As String)
public: void SaveAs(System::String ^ filename);

param.name: filename
param.span: 一个字符串，指定服务器上用于保存上载文件的位置的完整路径。

span.span: A string that specifies the full path of the location of the server on which to save the uploaded file.

summary.span: 将上载文件的内容保存到 Web 服务器上的指定路径。

span.span: Saves the contents of an uploaded file to a specified path on the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在 Web 服务器上将已上载文件的内容保存到指定的路径。The method saves the contents of an uploaded file to a specified path on the Web server. 控件不自动保存文件到服务器后用户选择要上载的文件。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您必须显式提供的控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供在用户单击以将文件上载一个按钮。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. 为保存指定的文件而编写的代码应调用方法，在服务器将文件的内容保存到指定的路径。The code that you write to save the specified file should call the method, which saves the contents of a file to a specified path on the server. 通常情况下，引发回发到服务器的事件的事件处理方法中调用方法。Typically, the method is called in an event-handling method for an event that raises a post back to the server. 例如，如果你提供一个用于将文件提交按钮，无法然后 click 事件的事件处理方法内包括代码以将文件保存到服务器。For example, if you provide a button to submit a file, the code to save the file to the server could then be included inside the event-handling method for the click event. 当调用方法，你必须要在其中保存已上载的文件服务器上指定的目录的完整路径。When you call the method, you must specify the full path of the directory on the server in which to save the uploaded file. 如果不显式指定路径在应用程序代码中，用户尝试将文件上载时将引发异常。If you do not explicitly specify a path in your application code, an exception is thrown when a user attempts to upload a file. 此行为有助于保护服务器上的文件，通过不允许用户指定要在其中保存上载文件的路径。This behavior helps keep the files on the server secure, by not allowing users to specify a path in which to save the files that they upload. 之前调用方法，则应使用属性来验证控件包含要上载的文件。Before calling the method, you should use the property to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 如果返回`true`，调用方法。If the returns `true`, call the method. 如果它返回`false`，显示一条消息指向指示该控件不包含文件的用户。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 如果未提供错误处理代码，以验证文件是否存在，如果尝试保存不存在的文件会引发异常。If you do not provide error-handling code to verify that a file exists, an attempt to save a nonexistent file throws an exception. 针对调用工作，ASP.NET 应用程序必须具有写入访问目录服务器上。For a call to the to work, the ASP.NET application must have write access to the directory on the server. 有两种方法的应用可获取写访问权限。There are two ways that the application can get write access. 你可以显式授予写访问权限的帐户在其下运行应用程序，将保存已上载的文件的目录中。You can explicitly grant write access to the account under which the application is running, in the directory in which the uploaded files will be saved. 或者，你可以增加到 ASP.NET 应用程序授予的信任级别。Alternatively, you can increase the level of trust that is granted to the ASP.NET application. 若要获取应用程序对正在执行目录的写访问权限，必须授予应用程序信任级别设置为具有对象值。To get write access to the executing directory for the application, the application must be granted the object with the trust level set to the value. 增加的信任级别会增加对服务器上的资源的应用程序的访问。Increasing the level of trust increases the application's access to resources on the server. 请注意，这是不安全的方法，因为恶意用户获得了你的应用程序的控制，则也将能够在此更高级别的信任下运行。Note that this is not a secure approach, because a malicious user who gains control of your application will also be able to run under this higher level of trust. 它是用户的一种最佳做法有应用程序运行所需的最小特权的上下文中运行 ASP.NET 应用程序。It is a best practice to run an ASP.NET application in the context of a user who has the minimum privileges that are required for the application to run. 有关在 ASP.NET 应用程序的安全性的详细信息，请参阅[Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)和[ASP.NET 信任级别和策略文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1)。For more information about security in ASP.NET applications, see [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad) and [ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建执行错误检查的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that performs error checking. 保存该文件之前，调用方法以验证要上载的文件是否存在。Before the file is saved, the method is called to verify that a file to upload exists. 此外，方法调用以检查已具有相同名称的文件是否存在路径中。In addition, the method is called to check whether a file that has the same name already exists in the path. 如果是这样，要上载的文件的名称前缀与之前大量调用方法。If it does, the name of the file to upload is prefixed with a number before the method is called. 这可以防止覆盖现有文件。This prevents the existing file from being overwritten. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/cs/fileupload.saveascs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/VB/fileupload.saveasvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: is not a full path.
